id.description: The GCP project number Cloud Account Management uses for managing the connected GCP project.

name.description: The name of the Google Cloud project to be used in Cloud Accounts.

description.description:
The description of the Google Cloud project.
If there is no description, the field is empty.

If-Match.description: Entity tag in MD5 format to perform version control on the resource to be updated. This is returned in response header `ETag` of the v3 GET method.
